tool.name: planemo_lint_python
tool.description: Runs Planemo lint on any ToolFactory xml history file

configfiles.configfile:
#raw
import lxml.etree as ET import os import subprocess import sys
def main(): assert len(sys.argv) >= 2, 'Must have input xml on command line' xmlin = sys.argv[1] tree = ET.parse(xmlin) root = tree.getroot() toolname = root.get('id') toolxml = os.path.join('/export/galaxy/tools/TFtools', toolname, '%s.xml' % toolname) cl = ['planemo', 'lint', toolxml] p = subprocess.run(cl, shell=False) if p.returncode > 0: print('Planemo lint call returned error %d') else: print('Lint report ends') main()
#end raw

tool.help:
